dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.rightTitle
dt-option.summary: Set the title attribute of the SearchBuilder right button

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.rightTitle` changes the title of the SearchBuilder right button.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init language.searchBuilder.rightTitle` parameter is `'indent criteria'`.
dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchBuilder will set the right button's title to `'indent criteria'`.
The value of `-init language.searchBuilder.rightTitle` is passed into an `-api i18n()` function.

example.title: Change title attribute for SearchBuilder right button
